text: Al-Tabni (, also spelled al-Tibni) is a town in eastern Syria, administratively part of the Deir ez-Zor Governorate, located along the Euphrates River, west of Deir ez-Zor. According to the Syria Central Bureau of Statistics, al-Tabni had a population of 7,205 in the 2004 census. ==References== Category:Populated places in Deir ez-Zor District Category:Populated places on the Euphrates River Category:Towns in Syria
title: Al-Tabni
